iata:shipLetInlineNumber.description: Identifies uniquely each line-item contained in the document.

iata:shipLetInlineNote.description: Contains an item level text note. Free text

iata:shipLetInTotalQuantity.description: Contains the total quantity purchased at line-item level.

iata:shipLetInLineSubTotalAmount.description: CALCULATED: Total Net Value per line-item (Total Quantity multiplied by Unit Price divided by Price-Basis Quantity)
